channel.title: About Aaron Rainbolt
channel.description:
Hi Patrick,
I see Aaron Rainbolt is only active since end 2022. Who is this guy? How can have so much knowledge while only being publicly active for 2 years? A Kicksecure coder has a lot of responsibilities.
Please triple check all his code and be sure it's not a bad actor like with xz

item.title: About Aaron Rainbolt
item.dc:creator: arraybolt3
item.description:
Slight correction - I’ve been active in the open-source world since mid-April 2022, having gotten involved in Lubuntu early in the Kinetic Kudu release cycle. You can see some of my first bug fixing activity here: Bug #1966774 “btrfs partioning with calamares results in unboota...” : Bugs : calamares-settings-ubuntu package : Ubuntu But still, that’s not a whole lot of time, so you raise a valid concern and careful review is a very good idea. (Besides, I’m a human and make mistakes, and peer review helps keep those from getting into the finished product.)

Read full topic
